channel.title: Squid on 我不是帅才
channel.description: Recent content in Squid on 我不是帅才

item.title: Ubuntu14 搭建Squid3代理
item.description: 需要一行一行复制安装 apt-get install squid curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hxchen/proxy/master/squid.conf > /etc/squid3/squid.conf mkdir -p /var/cache/squid chmod -R 777 /var/cache/squid service squid3 stop squid3 -z service squid3 restart
